title: Champ as your lover?
body: Which champion would you consider/pick to be your beloved; significant other? For example I would choose Syndra or Orianna because they know how to play with ba- er because they know how to support a person. So, who would you consider?

replies.body:
{{champion:7}} 

You know why.
Oh I know why *wink wink*; Double chains. That's pretty kinky :P
I thought it was because she is so hot and awesome, but I like your idea better.
(psst he was actually talking about her passive, but don't tell anyone *wink*)
(heh heh){{champion:7}}
I do. And I approve.
{{champion:25}} hands down. Bakes the best cookies :D

> {{champion:51}} 
> 
> She's got those fuzzy handcuffs, and she knows how to use em, if ya know what I mean.
> 
> Also {{champion:103}}... She's just so damn "charming."

i love it.
How is nobody going for that delicious {{champion:33}} booty?

Hmm. A tough choice. I'd have to pick someone I know I could get along with, and for me, that means someone caring, sweet, etc. Despite my inner villain wanting to pick a bad girl like Katarina or Jinx, I think Sona would be my best match. But really, all champions are potentially viable. Even the weird ones, though I think Cho'gath or Urgot and any common sexual positions would go together like a world on fire. Maybe that's just me.
So... You want a woman who can't speak? :P

I hear that a lot, but I think that would actually be the most difficult part for me, as I love communicating and sharing time like that and all. But let's be fair, Sona has her music, and she can always learn sign language. Which I could easily teach her. ^_^

{{champion:103}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:143}} 

Basically, almost every female champion in existance. Maybe some males. Eh.

Indeed.
Riven. Someone who exiled themselves from their home because she is standing for what she believes in. Good conviction, and strong minded.
Graves, That pool party skin is just too hot.
They are all crazy, so none?

*Cough* Sona *Cough*

*cough* Katerina *Cough*

*Cough* Janna *Cough*

So many more.....
you sound sick... I think soraka can help.

> you sound sick... I think soraka can help.

Dem Hips ;)

Sona's silent, and her music might be way too good (it affects emotions...)
Katarina is Noxian, and also an assassin (not a good bunch)
Janna is too windy. And if her classic skin is her regular attire, would be awkward to hang with.
Im sure shaco would like to joke around and backdoor {{champion:35}}
Before retcon, probably {{champion:39}}  or {{champion:99}} or {{champion:92}}
Also Vi, shes good at Fis- er i mean punching people. {{champion:254}}
Im surprised no one said Kassadin, hes good for back dooring. {{champion:38}}
Oh lord, too many to choose....but, kneejerk reaction, probably Riven. {{champion:92}}
{{champion:60}} :P

If I wasn't a dude... {{champion:201}} . Man's got big pecs and an even bigger heart. And he's gotta be great with kids. And Troublemaker Toss sounds like a great game :D

Anyways, I've always had a crush on {{champion:10}} . She's gorgeous and totally badass, and I have the feeling the delicate-beauty-beneath-the-armor thing she's got going on applies to her character as well as her looks.

It would be impossible to accurately choose someone to be a fitting lover; however, I'm going to have to make a list and discuss the pros and cons. By the way, I'm a chick, (my name gives it away, perhaps?) a straight chick.

{{champion:201}}  Personally, I'm not really attracted to bald, buff guys; however, Braum is a very sweet man who is couragous, honorable, and charmingly funny. He also loves animals, which is a big plus. Also, being handy is nice, too. I think I would, in real life, look past his appearance, and fall for his loveable personality.

{{champion:157}}  Yasuo is a guilty pleasure. He's deadly gorgeous. I also have a thing for Japanese men... don't judge. He has a smooth way with words and is clearly very agile and flexible... -wink wink- I'm not sure how well we would get along... probably not very well; but, like I said, guilty pleasure.

{{champion:81}}  Ezreal is so adorable, charming, and funny; although, I bet I am physically bigger than him, which may be a big odd... He also looks like an ex boyfriend. Haha.

{{champion:126}}  Jayce is also a gorgeous hunk of man candy. (he kinda reminds me of a friend of mine...) I'm pretty sure we would not do well since he's a genius scientist and I'm... not. I wouldn't be able to keep up with him; although, I could really get used to that gentleman-like persona.

{{champion:4}} When I first played League, I thought TF was the sexiest thing in the world; although, I know fer sure I would not get along with this gypsy. Haha.

I have a couple I would be interested in. It would depend :D {{champion:131}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:113}}  There's just something about the strong female type that I love.
{{champion:22}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:102}}

Luluuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu
She's too adorable and I love always-happy people :3
it would either be between {{champion:103}}  or {{champion:55}}

{{champion:89}} is good-looking has a nice personality, has determination, and probably won't kill me. However, the Sun is not my favorite celestial object, so maybe {{champion:131}}? She's at least somewhat inquisitive and determined, and I like looking at the Moon, so she probably wouldn't kill me. Personality-wise {{champion:161}} is the best match (we're both lone wolves who want to understand the universe), but I'm worried that he might try to disintegrate me. The tentacles would be interesting, though.

So, harem?
Syndra def knows how to handle balls

Hmm... I'll account for both looks and personality...

Well, I *do* main {{champion:76}}, but she'd probably be too much for me to handle.  Maybe.  If we got along well, sure why not (as long as she stayed in human form at the appropriate times).

But if not her, then probably {{champion:43}}. 

Other possibilities: {{champion:51}}, or {{champion:84}}, or maybe even {{champion:22}} if she wasn't with {{champion:23}}.

If going by personality only, {{champion:267}} or {{champion:16}} would be great too.

{{champion:114}} i like the self confidence she has about herself being best at what she does. 
{{champion:39}}  shes got that whole willing to sacrifice herself for others thing.  although thanks to soraka would this one sorta border on...um... necrophila?

If we're also in Runeterra, probably {{champion:201}} . I think he's the only champ that has a shot at keeping me alive (maybe {{champion:89}} too, though I can't say I want {{champion:131}} coming after my head).
{{champion:99}}  is love, {{champion:99}} is {{champion:99}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:28}}
Irelia is wife material
